main event: On November 1, 1957, a woman reported seeing an unusual airborne object over Huntington, West Virginia, described as two metallic hemispheres rapidly traveling at a high altitude.
interesting points: The object emitted no sound initially, followed by a jet engine-like noise and a booming sound., The object disappeared vertically from view within about one minute., Witness reported the object was approximately the size of an automobile., Weather conditions were clear with no unusual phenomena reported at the time of the sighting., The observer requested to remain anonymous to avoid potential ridicule.
sighted object: two metallic hemispheres separated by a clear section
witness description: female, 22 years old, high school graduate, Supervisor at Traffic Department, Chesapeake and Potomac Telephone Company
